narration_text: Welcome to Cybersecurity Explained. Today we're diving deep into one of the most common cyber threats: phishing attacks.
A phishing attack typically follows four distinct stages. First, reconnaissance, second, delivery, third, exploitation, and finally, data exfiltration.
These attacks are becoming increasingly sophisticated, targeting both individuals and large enterprises.
But there are concrete steps you can take to protect yourself. Always verify sender email addresses. Never click suspicious links. Use multi-factor authentication.
Remember, cybersecurity is everyone's responsibility. Stay vigilant, stay informed, and stay safe. Thanks for watching.
